text: A femminiello, also spelled femmeniello is an Italian word for a male with feminine nature and behaviour, and part of an old tradition in Neapolitan culture. They are believed to bring luck in gambling and are known to participate in games such as bingo and also some traditional events. ==Related pages== *LGBT rights in Italy ==Other websites== *The femminiello in Neapolitan culture Category:Gender Category:Italian culture
title: Femminiello
